paragraphs: I'm Alejandro Fernández, a Systems Engineering student about to graduate. I've worked with Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, Python and web fundamentals to build backend-first applications.
I enjoy turning requirements into scalable APIs and clean UI flows. I'm ready to contribute with cloud-aware solutions while growing in a dynamic team.
